page.title: 09THE DANBURY 3-DAY EVENT
page.content: In the past Danbury schools and assoiciates have offered a wide range of fun and activities such as squash clubs but the greatest of them all was the Danbury 3-Day Event.This was held at the Danbury Youth Camp.It was an enjoyable event.On Friday the 28th all the schools that chose to particapate had a day of showing their talent and hard work off.There were schools from as far off as Colchester.The atmosphere was happy and lively.Barclays Bank,TSB Bank and Essex Radio were the main sponsors and the event was held in commemoration of International Youth year.There were exhibitions of handi-crafts.Some professional Chinese kite flyers came to fly their kites and the biggest hot air balloon in the world was realeased into the sky.All in all it was an excellent day!
